name: visser
description:
visser is a game about fishing on a relaxing autumn day. Cast your rod and enjoy the atmosphere!

Features
  • Around 15 minutes of gameplay
  • Walk around the woods to find bait
  • Catch fish & float around in a boat
  • Randomly generated fish!


Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
